Text:
WHY OH GOD WHY!!!! 

this movie looked good, and I think it's based on the hentai series but this was shit. i know most hentai live action movies aren't great such as Angel of Darkness and La Blue Girl but this one was the worst. Cheesy directing, no hot and gorgeous women, and I was hoping to see a possession scene here and there but there was none AT ALL! I waited 2 days to download and was so disappointed. I am super pissed off and I recommend no one download unless you want to see ugly guys screw girls. No lesbian demonic possession *cries* WHY!
